p: Compound 293 was tested for antimicrobial activity against selected pathogens namely S. aureus, E. coli and Pseudomonas aeruginosa C. Gessard. Funiculosone ( 293) displayed antimicrobial activity inhibiting the bacterial pathogens. Funiculosone was able to inhibit the growth of E. coli, S. aureus and C. albicans with IC 50 of 25 μg/mL and 58 μg/mL and 35 μg/mL respectively [ 95].
